attributes.action: Give Naturists More Freedom and Equal Rights in Public Spaces
attributes.additional_details: Naturists need the equal rights just like every other community within society. The evidence is out there that simply being nude makes us happier and more confident. It is good for every body, regardless of background, ethnicity, gender and sexual orientation.
attributes.background: Naturism is simply connecting with nature and rediscovery of ourselves without the need of clothes. Being nude is beneficial to our wellbeing and mental health. Naturists deserve the right to coexist in society with the clothed community.
